definitions.definition: An identity or union of substance .
The actual, substantial presence of the body of Christ with the bread and wine of the sacrament of the Lord's Supper ; impanation , as opposed to transubstantiation .

main_definition: An identity or union of substance .
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity ) The actual, substantial presence of the body of Christ with the bread and wine of the sacrament of the Lord's Supper ; impanation , as opposed to transubstantiation .
